result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

RCAP Progress Report

Charges per attached criminal complaint. Conditions: It is a condition of this bond that the defendant NOT consume or possess any alcohol or controlled substances. This is to be monitored through random drug screens and/or breathalyzers by the Racine County Alternatives Program, Room MC340 (Law Enforcement Center 717 Wisconsin Ave Racine WI 53403). New referrals from Court must report on the day of their Court appearance.  Jail releases must report the following business day (M-Fr 8am-4:30pm).  In addition to random testing, the defendant is further ordered to test after each court appearance. Make all court appearances on time. Failure to appear will result in the issuance of a warrant for your arrest, possible bail jumping charges and forfeiture of any bond on deposit.
Status conference on April 25, 2022 at 08:30 am.

9:18 AM Prosecuting attorney Thomas Jerome Coaty appeared in court for the State of Wisconsin, Defendant Joel M Bowman appeared in court, Attorney Juan Sebastian Ramirez appeared in court for Joel M Bowman. Court Reporter: Sara Rogan. 
Court received RCAP violation in 22CF137.
Defense states that defendant will continue testing and a new case has been filed, requests to keep bond/conditions the same as previously ordered.
Defense received a new offer and is requesting a status hearing.
State defers to the Court.
BTC: Defendant to test weekly, bond in 22CF137 increased to $1,500.  Defendant has until Noon Friday to post bond, if not, he must report to RCJ.
Status conference scheduled for April 25, 2022 at 08:30 am.
